帵字的基本解释

帵
wān
〔帵子〕布帛剪裁后的余料。

帵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wān］
［《廣韻》一丸切，平桓，影。］
见“帵子”。

帵字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　帵； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页333第05
【廣韻】一丸切【集韻】烏丸切，?音剜。【廣韻】帵子，裁餘也。【正字通】今采帛舖謂剪截之餘曰帵子。　又【類篇】於袁切，音鴛。義同。

帵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
帵字的起名意思

暂无。

帵
Basic explanation of words
帵
wān
〔帵子〕The leftover material after cutting the cloth and silk.
帵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wān］
["Guangyun" a pill cut, flat huan, shadow. ]
See "帵子".
帵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　帵; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 333 No. 05
[Guangyun] Ichimaru cut [Jiyun] Karasuma cut, sound cut. [Guang Yun] Po Zi, cut Yu also. [Zhengzitong] Today's Caisi shop said that the rest of the cut is called the silk.　[Classes] Yu Yuan Qi, Yin Yuan. The same meaning.
